articles.description: The England football manager, 49, has been married to his wife of two decades Alison, 53, whose off-pitch support the manager has credited with keeping him grounded.
articles.content:
As Gareth Southgate looks to prepare the England squad for their first match of the 2022 World Cup against Iran tomorrow, there is sure to be one woman on his mind.

articles.author: Dominic Hogan
articles.title: 'Disgusting' incident sees fan URINATE in Warrington Town goalkeeper Tony Thompson's drink - Daily Mail
articles.description: A video showed the fan hopping the barriers between the stands and the pitch seemingly switching out Thompson's bottle for another similar one, with the caption 'p***** in keepers juice'.
